StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary:
Certified Data Scientist, offering over 1 year of qualitative experience in working on large & complex Data Science Projects to
provide suitable solutions for varied business problems to the clients
Proven skills in providing data-driven, action-oriented solutions to challenging business problems using data analytics and
advanced data-driven methods
Excels in collecting, analysing and processing complex data sets using advanced querying, visualization and analytics tools
Forward-focused professional with talent in effectively liaising with globally distributed cross-functional teams & enabling
knowledge-sharing amongst them; problem-solver with strong communication, team-building and analytical skills

PositionHistory.Title: JUNIOR DATA SCIENTIST
PositionHistory.Description:
as Data Scientist
Jun 2018 to Aug 2019
Key Result Areas:
Worked on Data Science & Management Projects entailing collection of large & complex datasets and performing
several statistical tests to obtain useful information from raw data
Assisted clients on large scale data and analytics using advanced statistical and machine learning models
Architected and implemented analytics and visualization components for data analysis to predict relevant solutions
Created and presented the results of data analysis to show the trends using R Language & Python

   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~     e5100491779465e401804435a0e176&sid=3810263223&AT=1580666510
2/2/20 19'05


Consulted with Trained Analysts to effectively access data & optimize Tableau dashboards
Maintained SQL scripts to create and populate tables in data warehouse for daily reporting across departments
Facilitated functions such as Incident & Change Management, created solution prototype, participated in technology
selection, controlled solution development and also supported project management activities
Reported overall status of the project to the client and senior management
